import React, {useState, Fragment} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {addEducation,loadProfile} from '../../../actions/profile' import {withRouter,Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const AddEducation = ({addEducation}) => { const [formData,setFormData] = useState({ school:'', fieldofstudy:'', degree:'', from:'', to:'', current:'', description:'' }) const { school, fieldofstudy, degree, from, to, current, description } = formData return (

Add Your Education

Add any school, bootcamp, etc that you have attended

* = required field
onChange(e)} required/>
) } addEducation.propTypes = { addEducation: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null,{addEducation})(withRouter(AddEducation))
